name: Hamster Hoard
description:
A 2 player game where only one hamster should have the most food hoard in their hide! Make sure you use your poop to stun your opponent! You can also steal a few of your opponent's hoard.

Note

You can only carry 2 food at a time

Controls

Player 1 (Mochi):
Move: W, A, S, D
Poop: Space
Hoard/Steal: LShift

Player 2 (Boba):
Move: arrows
Poop: Enter
Hoard/Steal: RShift

Additional feature coming soon

Poop at least 4x to make a poop chain, stunning and slowing your opponent.

Credits

Angelo Paonessa - Programming, Audio
Tiffany Van Langenberg - Art, Animation, Audio
